meanings.sent1: She summersaulted in the air at the gymnastics competition.
meanings.sent2: The acrobat summersaulted across the stage with grace.
meanings.sent3: The clown summersaulted into a giant cake, creating a messy but funny scene.
meanings.sent4: Her heart summersaulted with joy when she received the surprise gift.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons seemed to summersault in the sky during the festival.

meanings.sent1: The girl, feeling summersaulted, proudly showed off her gymnastics medal.
meanings.sent2: The acrobat, summersaulted and confident, prepared for the next daring stunt.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked summersaulted after playing in the muddy puddles all day.
meanings.sent4: The idea of going on a roller coaster left her feeling summersaulted with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden appeared summersaulted in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: Summersaulted is the past tense of summersault.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she summersaulted in the park and had a great time.
meanings.sent2: After she summersaulted, she landed perfectly on the soft mat.
meanings.sent3: The cat summersaulted playfully around the room, chasing a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His mind summersaulted with memories of the fun summer vacation.
meanings.sent5: The leaves summersaulted down from the tree in the autumn breeze.
